GeniusUpdated on 06 Aug 2019Your initial capital outlay is 1, assuming annual growth of 5% being 1.05; growth of 12% being 1.12To calculate it manually enter 1 followed by the multiply sign, then enter 1.05 and press “=“ however many times you want, each time being a year. Alternatively if you have a fixed number of years in mind. Eg. 20 years. At 5% annuallyTilt your iPhone horizontally and enter 1.05 followed by X^y followed by 20 and press “=“ (equals)1 comment5
